```{r}
library(quantmod)
aapl <- getSymbols("AAPL", auto.assign = F)
aapl <- data.frame(aapl)
# returns for 10 years
aapl_rtn_l <- diff(log(aapl$AAPL.Adjusted))
# returns for 1 month
aapl_rtn_s <- aapl_rtn_l[1:30]
# standardization
aapl_rtn_l_norm <- (aapl_rtn_l-mean(aapl_rtn_l))/sd(aapl_rtn_l)
aapl_rtn_s_norm <- (aapl_rtn_s-mean(aapl_rtn_s))/sd(aapl_rtn_s)
# plot probability density function for standardized long-term returns and standard normal distribution
plot(dnorm,-4,4,ylim=c(0,0.6),col="red",cex=2,type="o",main="AAPL Standardized PDF for 10-Year Returns")
lines(density(aapl_rtn_l_norm),xlim=c(-4,4),col="blue")
```
